f_template.body:
<launch> <arg name="temoto_namespace" default="$(arg temoto_ws_name)"/> <arg name="load_nl_terminal" default="true"/>
<include file="$(find temoto)/launch/temoto.launch"> <arg name="temoto_namespace" value="$(arg temoto_namespace)" /> <arg name="load_nl_terminal" value="$(arg load_nl_terminal)" /> <arg name="action_paths" value="$(find $(arg temoto_ws_name))/config/action_dst.yaml" /> </include> </launch>
